content: This is ridiculous. People need to stop being so sensitive and learn to take a joke. I mean, what's the harm in a bit of harmless satire or parody? It's not like it's hurting anyone. If someone can't take a little bit of criticism or humor, then maybe they shouldn't be in the spotlight. Freedom of speech means being able to express ourselves without fear of legal action, not tiptoeing around other people's fragile egos.
